mapper.sql: USER_ID, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, FULLNAME, USER_TYPE, PWD_CHANGED_TIME, IS_LOCKED, LOCKED_REASON, USER_HEAD, SEX, BIRTHDATE, MOBILE_TELEPHONE, EMAIL, CREDENTIALS_TYPE, CREDENTIALS_NUMBER, HOME_ADDRESS, REMARK, ACTIVE_FLAG, CREATED_BY, CREATION_TIME, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFICATION_TIME, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_org_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_org_user (USER_ID, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, FULLNAME, USER_TYPE, PWD_CHANGED_TIME, IS_LOCKED, LOCKED_REASON, USER_HEAD, SEX, BIRTHDATE, MOBILE_TELEPHONE, EMAIL, CREDENTIALS_TYPE, CREDENTIALS_NUMBER, HOME_ADDRESS, REMARK, ACTIVE_FLAG, CREATED_BY, CREATION_TIME, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFICATION_TIME, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdChangedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isLocked,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lockedReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credentialsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credentialsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modificationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select u.* from sys_org_user u, sys_org_unit_user uu where u.user_id = uu.user_id and uu.unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
